text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-saaan!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …fufuu!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san!! You were suuuuuuuper cool out there!!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thanks, Spe-chan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Really, you've shown us such an absurd running-style. 
You're even making us want to take off running like that.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: You said it…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: But, we won't let you pull ahead by youself just like this.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I'm also overflowing with excitement and emotion!! 
Absolutely, I want to run together with Suzuka-san again!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Well well, you have definitely shown me something very exciting.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Tachyon…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Today's run will, without a doubt, push "Uma Musume" 
to the next stage. I have a hunch that it'll become 
an important historical event.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka-kun and Trainer, you two are truly 
the ideal research materials.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Research materials… eh? Research…?

From now on, we'll show you even more of the 
"Uma Musume" Silence Suzuka continuing to chase her "scenery".

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Fufuu… how reliable of you two.

Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
so we can't stand here all day.

Alright, you've got an award ceremony to attend, 
so we can't stand here all day.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, you're right.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
…Everyone, thank you for your support. 
While I was running, I could hear all of your voices.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And, Trainer-san's voice too.

Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
And you've done more than responded to that-

Gently giving you that push forward, is my duty after all. 
And you've done more than responded to that-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Fufuu… Yes, I've returned.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Well then everyone, we'll have to continue this talk later.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm… being called research materials, 
she does not seem to like that.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Well, it is not as if it really matters what I call 
her. But if it seems to bother her, then…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka-kun is, the "dream" of many Uma Musume and people- 
How does that sound?
Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.
Yeah, that sounds the most appropriate.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Suzukaaa! Thanks for the awesome race!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: From now on, show us more of that running!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. 
Everyone's cheers, gave me the gentle push I needed.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
From now on, for the sake of continuing to see a lot more 
"scenery" I will continue running… and-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'll continue to show everyone the "scenery" that I see…!
